name: svc-train
label: Support Vector Classification Train
description: Component is responsible for running svc training on synthetic data which is created by using scikit's make_classification method. Data creation is inclusive inside the component itself.

arguments.label: Penalty parameter C
arguments.description: Penalty parameter C of the error term

arguments.label: Kernel
arguments.description: Specifies the kernel type to be used in the algorithm. It must be one of ‘linear’, ‘poly’, ‘rbf’, ‘sigmoid’, ‘precomputed’ or a callable. If none is given, ‘rbf’ will be used. If a callable is given it is used to pre-compute the kernel matrix from data matrices; that matrix should be an array of shape n_samples, n_samples).

arguments.label: Degree of the polynomial kernel function
arguments.description: Degree of the polynomial kernel function (‘poly’). Ignored by all other kernels.

arguments.label: Gamma
arguments.description: Kernel coefficient for ‘rbf’, ‘poly’ and ‘sigmoid’.Current default is ‘auto’ which uses 1 / n_features, if gamma='scale' is passed then it uses 1 / (n_features * X.std()) as value of gamma. The current default of gamma, ‘auto’, will change to ‘scale’ in version 0.22. ‘auto_deprecated’, a deprecated version of ‘auto’ is used as a default indicating that no explicit value of gamma was passed.

arguments.label: Maximum number of iterations
arguments.description: Maximum number of iterations taken for the algorithm to converge

arguments.label: Model output file
arguments.description: File to use for saving the trained model
